title: Ep. 173 "Protect Yourself" ft. Nicole Roebuck of AID Atlanta
description:
This week Nicole Roebuck, Executive Director or AID Atlanta joins us to discuss safe sex, HIV prevention drugs, how to protect yourself when your partner is HIV positive and why HIV is so prevalent in the south, especially Atlanta...and it's not why you may think.

It's important to know your status. Visit www.aidatlanta.org if in the metro Atlanta area or search for Ryan White projects near you. Many places offer FREE testing and FREE Transportation. HIV no longer carries the "death sentence" it used to. You can live a long healthy life IF and only if you know your status.

visit www.nativedeodorant.com and use promo code COCKTALES for 20% off your first purchase
